summary: Platinum is a rare, valuable metal with the symbol Pt. It's known for being very unreactive and having a silver-white color. Found mostly in South Africa, it's used in many important ways, like helping cars run cleaner (catalytic converters) and in medicine to treat cancer. Platinum is also used in jewelry because it's strong and doesn't rust or change color. Its name comes from the Spanish word for "little silver."
title: Platinum
